name: The Fleeting Hour of Life
description:
Created in 48 hours for the LevelUpUK Special Effect Charity Game Jam, with the theme "Side Effects". I apologise in advance to all parties involved, particularly the innocent charity.

Please play one of the better games and then donate some money here:

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/levelupuk

Music: www.bensound.com

Environmental assets: KENNEY

DESCRIPTION:

Your God loves you.

They have granted you forgiveness, a second chance at a squandered life.

Create your form, and then live.
